==== Welcome ====
 We would like to take this time and welcome you the Open Source Collaboration Team's wiki.  This team is dedicated to providing a medium in which the Open Source and Ubuntu Communities can collaborate.  This should benifit Ubuntu and Open Source combined, moving towards a common goal; Free Open Source Solutions, with cutting edge technology and top of the line support and more importantly, Collaboration.
